summary.span: 指定要作為便捷鍵的含底線字元。

span.span: Specifies with an underscore the character that is used as the access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的內容有多個底線字元，只有第一個會轉換成; 其他底線會顯示為一般文字。If your content has multiple underscore characters, only the first one is converted into an ; the other underscores appear as normal text. 如果您想要轉換成的存取金鑰的底線字元不是第一個底線，用於任何底線前面的您想要轉換的兩個連續底線。If the underscore that you want converted to the access key is not the first underscore, use two consecutive underscores for any underscores that precede the one that you want to convert. 例如，下列程式碼包含的存取金鑰並將顯示為 _Hello**W**ogw:For example, the following code contains an access key and displays as _Hello**W**orld: ``` __Hello_World ``` 由於前面 H 底線是雙精度浮點數，W 鍵會註冊為便捷鍵。Because the underscore that precedes H is a double, the W key registers as the access key. 若要使用控制項的樣式中的內容主機，來設定在，如本範例所示：To use as a content host in a control style, set in the , as this example shows: ``` ``` ## Examples 您可以使用標記，以建立; 不過，不需要標記。You can use the tag to create an ; however, a tag is not necessary. 下列範例示範如何建立存取金鑰，包含或不含標記。The following example shows how to create an access key with and without the tag. [!code-xaml[AccessText#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AccessText/CS/pane1.xaml#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要搭配 項目使用的字型大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the font size to use with the element.
The font size to use.

value.span: 預設為 度量資訊所決定的字型大小。

span.span: The default is the font size that is determined by the metric.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *Double**Double* 字串表示值。A string representation of a value. 這個值會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，您可以在其中指定的值`1`。For example, you can specify a value of `1`. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* A*雙*，後面接著這些單位宣告字串的其中一個值： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm==(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 為點;1pt==(96/72) 像素`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **附註**在許多情況下，您可以將雙精度浮點數`Auto`; 不過，您無法將此屬性設定為`Auto`。**Note** In many cases, you can set a double to `Auto`; however, you cannot set this property to `Auto`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，以變更文字的外觀控制項。The following example shows how to set properties to change the appearance of the text in an control. [!code-xaml[AccessText#AccessTextProps](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AccessText/CS/pane1.xaml#accesstextprops)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LineHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.LineHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定每個線條方塊的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line box.

value.span: Double，指定每個線條方塊的高度。

span.span: A double that specifies the height of each line box.

value.span: 此值必須等於或大於0.0034而且等於或小於160000。

span.span: This value must be equal to or greater than 0.0034 and equal to or less then 160000.

value.span: 值為(的屬性值的相等自動) 會使行高由目前字型特性自動決定。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of Auto) causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更此值不會變更相關聯的文字; 的高度相反地，它會變更包含它的方塊。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; instead, it changes the box that contains it. 若要變更文字的大小，請使用屬性。To change the size of the text, use the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 字串表示值。A string representation of a value. 這個值會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，您可以在其中指定的值`1`。For example, you can specify a value of `1`. 相同範圍限制的屬性值一節中所述適用於此處。The same range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply here. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* A*雙*，後面接著這些單位宣告字串的其中一個值： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm==(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 為點;1pt==(96/72) 像素`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px *Auto**Auto* 自動行高的判斷。An automatic line height determination. 如果您以程式設計方式設定*自動*值，該值會對應到。If you programmatically set the *Auto* value, its value corresponds to .

summary.span: 取得或設定強制執行 屬性的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how the property is enforced.

value.span: 值，決定 屬性的行為。

span.span: A value that determines the behavior of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會控制保留文字的行方塊。 properties control the line box that is reserved for text. 可讓使用者設定的建議高度。 allows users to set a suggestion of height. 定義如何會強制執行。 defines how the is enforced. 您可以設定屬性，以或。You can set the property to or . - 值就會增加到最高的物件，在一行的行。The value increases the line to the tallest object in the line. 它可確保沒有任何項目物件，或修剪。It ensures that no item overdraws or is trimmed. - 值會強制執行上所有行的值。The value enforces a value on all lines. 如果屬性不會提供足夠的空間、 透支或修剪的文字時。If the property does not provide sufficient space, the text is either overdrawn or trimmed. 發生於取決於值。Which occurs depends on the value. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

span.span: The text without the first underscore character.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用，不會建立存取金鑰屬性，來提供文字項目。An access key is not created if you use the property to supply text for an element. 這個屬性是在內部用來決定的存取金鑰所顯示的文字。This property is used internally to determine the text that is displayed by the access key. 若要設定額外的文字不包含這個助憶鍵 （加上底線字元），或擷取存取金鑰的文字，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to set additional text that does not contain the mnemonic (underlined character) or to retrieve the access key text. ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *_accessText**_accessText* 包含底線字元的字串。A string that contains the underscore character. 這個值會變成控制代碼存取金鑰*物件*。This value becomes an that handles access keys for the *object*. 存取金鑰是緊接在底線字元。The access key is the character that immediately follows the underscore. *accessTextObject**accessTextObject* 。The . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、 , | ## Examples 下列範例會建立自訂的存取金鑰，其中包含這個助憶鍵，並使用，以設定文字的其餘部分的第一個字母的存取金鑰屬性。The following example creates an access key that customizes the first letter of the access key, which contains the mnemonic, and then sets the rest of the text by using the property. [!code-xaml[AccessTextProps_snip#AccessTextText](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AccessTextProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#accesstexttext)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::TextAlignment TextAlignment { System::Windows::TextAlignment get(); void set(System::Windows::TextAlignment value); };
member this.TextAlignment : System.Windows.TextAlignment with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定內容的水平對齊。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content.
The horizontal alignment of the text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需對齊的清單，請參閱。For a list of alignments see . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

summary.span: 取得或設定加入至 項目文字的裝飾。

span.span: Gets or sets the decorations that are added to the text of an element.
The applied to the text of an .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需文字裝飾的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about text decorations, see . 通常未設定此屬性，藉由使用標記或程式碼。This property is not typically set, either by using markup or code. 這個屬性會公開預設裝飾的便捷鍵 （在相同的文字色彩，做為文字底線），可能的樣式或以程式設計方式變更。This property exposes the default decoration for an access key (an underline in the same text color as the text) for possible styling or programmatic change. 因為使用者預期的存取金鑰識別碼，具有特定的外觀[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，較好的選擇是使用整個應用程式的機制，例如應用程式樣式或自訂佈景主題來變更這個屬性。Because users expect access key identifiers to have a certain appearance in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], a better choice is to change this property by using application-wide mechanisms, such as application styles or custom themes. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreTextDecorations**OneOrMoreTextDecorations* 一或多個項目。One or more elements. 如果您要定義自訂的文字裝飾的文字，請使用此語法。Use this syntax if you are defining custom text decorations. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to:建立文字裝飾](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For details, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常未設定此屬性，藉由使用標記或程式碼。This property is not typically set, either by using markup or code. 這個屬性會公開預設的效果可能樣式或以程式設計方式變更存取金鑰。This property exposes the default effects for an access key for possible styling or programmatic change. 因為使用者預期的存取金鑰識別碼，具有特定的外觀[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，較好的選擇是使用整個應用程式的機制，例如應用程式樣式或自訂佈景主題來變更這個屬性。Because users expect access key identifiers to have a certain appearance in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], a better choice is to change this property by using application-wide mechanisms, such as application styles or custom themes. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreTextEffects**OneOrMoreTextEffects* 一或多個項目。One or more elements. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
